application.Direction

    字段
    说明
    protected Direction
    Robot.direction
    The current direction the robot is facing.
    protected Direction
    Robot.initialDirection
    The initial direction of the robot, used for resetting.

    说明
    Direction
    Robot.getDirection()
    Gets the current direction the robot is facing.
    static Direction
    Direction.random()
    Returns a random direction from the available directions.
    static Direction
    Direction.valueOf(String name)
    返回带有指定名称的该类的枚举常量。
    static Direction[]
    Direction.values()
    返回包含该枚举类的常量的数组， 顺序与声明这些常量的顺序相同
